                              SoC HAL APIs#

                              Includes

                              Functions#

                              int16_t
                              rsi_mem_wr(uint32_t addr, uint16_t len, uint8_t *dBuf)

                              Perform a memory write to the module.

                              int16_t
                              rsi_mem_rd(uint32_t addr, uint16_t len, uint8_t *dBuf)

                              Perform a memory read from the module.

                              int16_t
                              rsi_boot_insn(uint8_t type, uint16_t *data)
                              int16_t
                              rsi_waitfor_boardready(void)

                              Waits to receive board ready from WiFi module.

                              int16_t
                              rsi_select_option(uint8_t cmd)
                              void
                              rsi_hal_intr_config(void(*rsi_interrupt_handler)(void))

                              HAL API should contain the code to initialize the register/pins related to interrupts and enable the interrupts.

                              void
                              rsi_hal_intr_mask(void)

                              Disable the SPI Interrupt.This HAL API should contain the code to mask/disable interrupts.

                              void
                              rsi_hal_intr_unmask(void)

                              This HAL API should contain the code to enable interrupts.

                              void
                              rsi_hal_intr_clear(void)

                              HAL API should contain the code to clear the handled interrupts.

                              uint8_t
                              rsi_hal_intr_pin_status(void)

                              Check interrupt pin status(pin level whether it is high/low).

                              Raise the packet pending interrupt to TA.

                              Clear interrupt raised by M4.

                              ROM_WL_clear_ta_interrupt_mask()

                              Clear interrupt raised by M4.

                              void
                              ROM_WL_set_ta_interrupt_mask()

                              Process a interrupt mask.

                              void
                              ROM_WL_mask_ta_interrupt(uint32_t interrupt_no)

                              Process a interrupt mask.

                              void
                              ROM_WL_unmask_ta_interrupt(uint32_t interrupt_no)

                              Process a interrupt unmask.

                              void
                              ROM_WL_clear_ta_to_m4_interrupt(uint32_t interrupt_no)

                              Clear interrupt raised by TA.

                              void
                              ROM_WL_rsi_transfer_to_ta_done_isr(global_cb_t *global_cb_p)

                              Called when TA has read the memory content in the shared memory and raises the interrupt to M4.

                              rsi_pkt_t *
                              ROM_WL_rsi_get_rx_pkt(global_cb_t *global_cb_p)

                              Read a packet from NWP.

                              void
                              ROM_WL_rsi_receive_from_ta_done_isr(global_cb_t *global_cb_p)

                              Called when DMA done for RX packet is received.

                              void
                              ROM_WL_rsi_m4_interrupt_isr(global_cb_t *global_cb_p)

                              Raise the packet pending interrupt to TA.

                              void
                              rsi_hal_board_init(void)

                              This function Initializes the platform.

                              Function Documentation#

                              rsi_mem_wr#

                              int16_t rsi_mem_wr (uint32_t addr, uint16_t len, uint8_t *dBuf)

                              Perform a memory write to the module.

                              Parameters
                              [in]addr

                              - Address to write to

                              [in]len

                              - Number of bytes to write

                              [in]dBuf

                              - Pointer to the buffer of data to write

                              Returns

                              • 0 - SUCCESS -1 - SPI busy / Timeout -2 - SPI Failure

                              int16_t rsi_mem_rd (uint32_t addr, uint16_t len, uint8_t *dBuf)

                              Perform a memory read from the module.

                              Parameters
                              [in]addr

                              - Address to read from

                              [in]len

                              - Number of bytes to read

                              [in]dBuf

                              - Pointer to the buffer to receive the data into

                              Returns

                              • 0 - SUCCESS -1 - SPI busy / Timeout -2 - SPI Failure

                              rsi_waitfor_boardready#

                              int16_t rsi_waitfor_boardready (void)

                              Waits to receive board ready from WiFi module.

                              Parameters
                              [in]
                              [out]none

                              Returns

                              • errCode 0 = SUCCESS < 0 = Failure -3 = Board ready not received -4 = Bootup options last configuration not saved -5 = Bootup options checksum failed -6 = Bootloader version mismatch

                              description#

                              This API is used to check board ready from WiFi module.


                              Definition at line 204 of file /home/jenkins/workspace/Si917_Combo_SDK_Build/SI917_COMBO_SDK.1.0.0.23/platforms/si91x/hal/src/rsi_bootup_config.c

                              rsi_frame_write#

                              int16_t rsi_frame_write (rsi_frame_desc_t *uFrameDscFrame, uint8_t *payloadparam, uint16_t size_param)

                              Common function for all the commands.

                              Parameters
                              [in]uFrameDscFrame

                              - Frame descriptor

                              [in]payloadparam

                              - Pointer to the command payload parameter structure

                              [in]size_param

                              - Size of the payload for the command

                              Returns

                              • errCode -1 = SPI busy / Timeout -2 = SPI Failure 0 = SUCCESS

                              description#

                              This is a common function used to process a command to the Wi-Fi module.

                              Common function for all the commands.

                              Returns

                              • 0 - SUCCESS < 0 - FAILURE -1 - SPI busy / Timeout in case of SPI -2 - SPI Failure in case of SPI

                              Note

                              • Enable DEBUG_PACKET_EXCHANGE macro for spi level packet exchange debug prints and MAX_PRINT_PAYLOAD_LEN for configuring no.bytes of payload to print, by default it will print 8 bytes of payload..


                              Definition at line 163 of file /home/jenkins/workspace/Si917_Combo_SDK_Build/SI917_COMBO_SDK.1.0.0.23/platforms/si91x/hal/src/rsi_hal_mcu_m4.c

                              References ROM_WL_API_S::rsi_frame_write , and rsi_frame_desc_s::frame_len_queue_no
